summary: A presidential bodyguard is assigned to protect an objecting first lady, as repeated attempts are made on her life.

keywords: the white house|washington monument washington d.c.|assassin|bodyguard|first lady
director: Director: Peter R. Hunt (as Peter Hunt)
title: El guardaespaldas de la primera dama
